Sentencas: NiO-YSZ and CoO-YSZ eutectic rods were produced by directional solidification using the laser floating zone method (LFZ).
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: This technique produces highly structured material consisting of alternate lamellae of transition metal oxide and zirconia with variable interlamellar spacing depending on growth conditions.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: We have chosen conditions for interlamellar spacing of about I ton.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: The rnicrostructure is homogeneous and mechanically stable during thermochemical reduction.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: Complete reduction of the transition metal oxide produces a lamellar porous cermet with porous metallic lamellae alternated with the YSZ phase.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients of the cermets are those of the YSZ skeleton.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: Reaction kinetics at different temperatures during the reduction process were studied by gravimetric methods.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: The reduction process within the complete temperature ran.-e studied for NiO-YSZ, and at high temperatures for CoO-YSZ seems to be controlled by the O2- diffusion, through the YSZ phase.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: The amount of Ni2+ and Co2+ ions dissolved in the YSZ phase is 2 and 5 mol%.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: Resistivity values for the cermets along the solidification axis are 50 mu Omega cm for Co-YSZ and 130 mu Omega cm for Ni-YSZ.
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites

Sentencas: These materials are porous, ionic and electronic conductors and could be used as textured anodes for solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Structured porous Ni- and Co-YSZ cermets fabricated from directionally solidified eutectic composites
